name: rats
description: Any character wounded has a 1 in 6 chance of losing 1 additional life due to an infected wound.

name: vampire bats
description: Spells are cast at -1 due to their distracting shrieking.

name: goblin swarmlings
reaction: (d6): 1 flee, 2-3 flee if outnumbered, 4 bribe (5 gp x goblin), 5–6 fight.

name: giant centipedes
description: Any character wounded by a giant centipede must save versus level 2 poison or lose 1 additional life.

name: vampire frogs
reaction: (d6): 1 flee, 2-4 fight, 5-6 fight to the death

name: skeletal rats
description: Crushing weapon attacks are at +1 against skeletal rats, but they cannot be attacked by bows and slings.
